title: Strengthening Early Algebraic Thinking and Mathematical Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic comprehension of mathematical concepts and experience in drafting professional documents
context.additional_context: Learners who, as organizational decision-makers, require enhanced competencies in data-driven reporting and team communication.

learning_goals: Learners will clearly express algebraic concepts using verbal/non-verbal tools with over 80% accuracy.
Learners will organize mathematical ideas into structured narrative formats (achieving at least Level 3 on assessment criteria).
Learners can collaborate with a team to orally present and visually represent the mathematical problem-solving process (feedback evaluation of 4 points or higher on a 5-point scale).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
